question_text: Which of the following practices help prevent electrical hazards when handling computer power supplies? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Avoid working on PSUs entirely unless qualified
Attach wrist strap to metal case ground point
Use insulated tools for probing energized circuits
correct_answer: Avoid working on PSUs entirely unless qualified
Use insulated tools for probing energized circuits
explanation: Only trained professionals should handle PSU internals. Safety practices include discharging capacitors and using insulated tools.
